# akp_instance_ip_allow_list (Resource)

Manages the IP allow list for an Argo CD instance. This resource allows you to configure IP addresses that are allowed to access the Argo CD instance. This resource replaces the deprecated `ip_allow_list` field in the `akp_instance` resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `entries` (Attributes List) List of IP allow list entries (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--entries))
- `instance_id` (String) The ID of the Argo CD instance

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource ID (same as instance_id)

<a id="nestedatt--entries"></a>
### Nested Schema for `entries`

Required:

- `ip` (String) IP address or CIDR block to allow (e.g., '192.168.1.0/24' or '2001:db8::/32')

Optional:

- `description` (String) Description of the IP allow list entry
